Module com.example.siechoteli
Package com.example.siechoteli.klient.guests

Class GuestsController

java.lang.Object
com.example.siechoteli.klient.guests.GuestsController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class GuestsController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Class that handles inserting, deleting, and updating our database and FXML table with clients data. Class which holds template for our table

    • getGuestsList

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Guests> getGuestsList()
      This function sends a message to a server and server returns data of all guests in String List. * Later we create new guest object and save in a loop all this data into guestes object
      Returns:
      Function returns observableList of Guests

    • showGuests

      public void showGuests()
      This function get return from getGuestList method and later saves it into ObservableList list. Later this updates our TableViewGusests with our list
